content: wildflower field socks by marie-elyse dugal in collaboration with ravelution yarn ravelry marie-elyse dugal patterns tipoussins projects instagram @marieelysedugal #wildflowerfieldsocks this collaboration with ravelution yarn was inspired by fields of wildflowers in spring and summer colourful and delicate i hope these socks bring you joy �1 yarn and notions yarn fingering weight sock set or one 100-110g skein 400-450 yards 2 colour mid-calf version main colour 40-75g 175-350 yards and contrast colour 20-25g 80-100 yards 2 colour mid-calf sample in wilflower sock set by ravelution yarn shortie sample in hey there dahlia by ravelution yarn needles 2 25mm i use needles with a long cable for magic loop or use your preferred needles such as 9 in circulars or dpns gauge 9 sts = 1 inch in stockinette nota bene special instructions for shortie socks are in blue at the end of the written instructions options for using a contrasting colour and doing the 2 rounds of petals colourwork will be noted in purple throughout the pattern charts note that the charts can be found at the end of the written instructions please ensure that you follow the chart for your given size also note that in the medium and large sizes the stitch count for the cuff chart is different than the count for the leg and foot chart please refer to the written instructions for details of the set up round that ensures the correct stitch count �2 abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit slip the next 2 stitches consecutively knitwise then return these stitches to the left
